title: University applicants in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2010 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of university applicants, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2012.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2016.
But, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2012 to 2010.
gold: This statistic shows the number of applicants to universities in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010 to 2018 . The number of applicants peaked in 2016 . The lower figures in 2012 and 2013 may be connected to the rise of the tuition fee limit in 2012 to 9,000 British pounds per year .
